name: The (W)hole Planet
description:
Controls: A & D to steer / ESC to pause.

Your job is to control the rover and collect data from the collapsing planet! Try to survive as long as possible to transmit as much data back to home base as you can!

If you play the game, thanks so much! I started learning Unity around two week ago and this is my first completed game.  Most of my week was spent learning how to model in blender and use all the tools included in Unity.

I won't be updating the game since the code is a huge mess and I just really want to move on to a new project. I know there are a lot of bugs and, although I won't be updating this game, I still want feedback so I can carry it over to my next project.

The music and sound effects were made by my friend Jaxy, whose work can be found here: 

https://soundcloud.com/jaxyedm

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAb4l1RwuSmYnqaFR14_DVA
